channel.title: RuneEmpire server! help me edit it to make it better!
channel.description:
Im trying to make a server just like Runescape! Its name is RuneEmpire! So far it's completely blank! There are No NPC's... there's just the land, building's, tree's ect. It's like a blank Runescape! So it brings me to ask some requests: 1: can somebody fix the tele spells so that when you tele you dont get stuck and have to restart your client. 2: can somebody fix all the spells so they only work with the correct runes and Lvls. 3: can somebody add the ability to costumize your character when they first make their account and log in. 4: can somebody add working duel arena with staking in al-kharid and get rid of those custom shops there. 5: can somebody fix running to work properly with 100% energy that drains when you run. 6: can somebody change the ability to PK anywhere you want, and make it so you can only pk in the wilderness. 7: and can somebody add wilderness Lvls!!!
Ofcourse if you fix these problems I will give you credit! I think I can make the shops and NPC's and quests and the rest of the stuff(but if you would like to help me out there too that would be GREAT!!! :D).
the source for RuneEmpire Server is Attached!!! P.S. If you "CAN NOT" fix it for me please tell me how or send me a link!

item.title: RuneEmpire server! help me edit it to make it better!
item.dc:creator: @Evanz Evanz
item.description:
@Evanz wrote:

Most of these things can be fixed by tuts…
just use the search button

Read full topic

item.title: RuneEmpire server! help me edit it to make it better!

item.description:
@f_2_p_2_p_f wrote:

Umm…mabey you shouldn’t let others download the server or they will be able to use it, and you should only get a few people to do these things by making a “development team”, I’m sure you know what that is.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneEmpire server! help me edit it to make it better!
item.dc:creator: @AAcrazyman AAcrazyman
item.description:
@AAcrazyman wrote:

Im trying to make a server just like Runescape!
Its name is RuneEmpire!
So far it’s completely blank! There are No NPC’s… there’s just the land, building’s, tree’s ect.
It’s like a blank Runescape!
So it brings me to ask some requests:
1: can somebody fix the tele spells so that when you tele you dont get stuck and have to restart your client.
2: can somebody fix all the spells so they only work with the correct runes and Lvls.
3: can somebody add the ability to costumize your character when they first make their account and log in.
4: can somebody add working duel arena with staking in al-kharid and get rid of those custom shops there.
5: can somebody fix running to work properly with 100% energy that drains when you run.
6: can somebody change the ability to PK anywhere you want, and make it so you can only pk in the wilderness.
7: and can somebody add wilderness Lvls!!!

Ofcourse if you fix these problems I will give you credit!
I think I can make the shops and NPC’s and quests and the rest of the stuff(but if you would like to help me out there too that would be GREAT!!! :D).

the source for RuneEmpire Server is Attached!!!
P.S. If you “CAN NOT” fix it for me please tell me how or send me a link!

Read full topic
